name: KID MOTO 2 The Explosive Sequel to Kid Moto Cafe Racer
blurb: I finished Kid Moto One with a limited budget and little time. Now I want to make a Faster, Louder and Bigger Version.  KID MOTO TWO.

rewards.reward: You will receive a virtual high-five and many many thanks from me for your support. Thanks so much, you are awesome.

Much Thanks!\r\n\r\nYou will receive a virtual High-Five and a free version of the game on your device. This reward will not be available until December 2013 or when game is completed, which might be earlier. You will receive instructions in an email on how to download the game. Thanks!!

You will receive a Kid Moto sticker and a nice glossy Kid Moto Postcard with a handwritten note from me.

I totally dig you! Thanks for looking.

I will also let you pick a landmark for the game, have it made and put into the game.

For the Artwork picks I would have you contact me personally with your choices so I could have the artwork produced.

Last but least if you want I will include your name in the end credits as associate producer.
